lensfocallength: 4.5-135.0mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 25-750mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
vibrationreduction: Combination ofLens-shift and Electronic VR (still pictures)
lensconstruction: 13 elements in 11 groups (3 ED lens elements)
digitalzoom: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 3,000mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
builtinflashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
